Goal:

Premises:
maxTerm = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix maxTerm (entries : list entry) : term := match entries with | [] => 0 | e :: _ => eTerm e end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> term Arguments maxTerm {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
raft_data = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments raft_data {orig_base_params raft_params}
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
findAtIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix findAtIndex (entries : list entry) (i : logIndex) {struct entries} : option entry := match entries with | [] => None | e :: es => if eIndex e =? i then Some e else if eIndex e <? i then None else findAtIndex es i end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex -> option entry Arguments findAtIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Notation log := (RaftState.log term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output)
maxIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix maxIndex (entries : list entry) : logIndex := match entries with | [] => 0 | e :: _ => eIndex e end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex Arguments maxIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
haveNewEntries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (state : raft_data) (entries : list entry) => not_empty entries && match findAtIndex (log state) (maxIndex entries) with | Some e => negb (maxTerm entries =? eTerm e) | None => true end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), raft_data -> list entry -> bool Arguments haveNewEntries {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%list_scope
eTerm = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (e : entry) => let (_, _, _, _, eTerm, _) := e in eTerm : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), entry -> term Arguments eTerm {orig_base_params raft_params}
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
handleAppendEntries_log : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> log st' = log st \/ currentTerm st <= t /\ es <> [] /\ pli = 0 /\ log st' = es \/ (currentTerm st <= t /\ es <> [] /\ pli <> 0 /\ (exists e : entry, In e (log st) /\ eIndex e = pli /\ eTerm e = plt)) /\ log st' = es ++ removeAfterIndex (log st) pli
haveNewEntries_not_empty : forall (st : raft_data) (es : list entry), haveNewEntries st es = true -> es <> []
maxIndex_non_empty : forall l : list entry, l <> [] -> exists e : entry, In e l /\ maxIndex l = eIndex e /\ maxTerm l = eTerm e
entries_match_append : forall (xs ys es : list entry) (ple : entry) (pli : nat) (plt : term), sorted xs -> sorted ys -> sorted es -> entries_match xs ys -> (forall e1 e2 : entry, eIndex e1 = eIndex e2 -> eTerm e1 = eTerm e2 -> In e1 es -> In e2 ys -> (forall e3 : entry, eIndex e3 <= eIndex e1 -> In e3 es -> In e3 ys) /\ (pli <> 0 -> exists e4 : entry, eIndex e4 = pli /\ eTerm e4 = plt /\ In e4 ys)) -> (forall i : nat, pli < i <= maxIndex es -> exists e : entry, eIndex e = i /\ In e es) -> (forall e : entry, In e es -> pli < eIndex e) -> findAtIndex xs pli = Some ple -> eTerm ple = plt ->...-> entries_match (es ++ removeAfterIndex xs pli) ys
entries_match_scratch : forall (es ys : list entry) (plt : term), sorted es -> uniqueIndices ys -> (forall e1 e2 : entry, eIndex e1 = eIndex e2 -> eTerm e1 = eTerm e2 -> In e1 es -> In e2 ys -> (forall e3 : entry, eIndex e3 <= eIndex e1 -> In e3 es -> In e3 ys) /\ (0 <> 0 -> exists e4 : entry, eIndex e4 = 0 /\ eTerm e4 = plt /\ In e4 ys)) -> (forall i : nat, 0 < i <= maxIndex es -> exists e : entry, eIndex e = i /\ In e es) -> (forall e : entry, In e es -> 0 < eIndex e) -> (forall y : entry, In y ys -> 0 < eIndex y) -> entries_match es ys
findAtIndex_uniq_equal : forall (e e' : entry) (es : list entry), findAtIndex es (eIndex e) = Some e' -> In e es -> uniqueIndices es -> e = e'
contiguous = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (leaderLog entries : list entry) => (prevLogIndex = 0 \/ (exists e : entry, findAtIndex leaderLog prevLogIndex = Some e /\ eTerm e = prevLogTerm)) /\ (forall e : entry, In e leaderLog -> eIndex e > prevLogIndex -> eIndex e <= maxIndex entries -> In e entries) /\ (forall e e' : entry, eIndex e = eIndex e' -> eTerm e = eTerm e' -> In e entries -> In e' leaderLog -> e = e') : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), logIndex -> term -> list entry -> list entry -> Prop Arguments contiguous {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ (_ _)%list_scope
sorted = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix sorted (log : list entry) : Prop := match log with | [] => True | e :: es => (forall e' : entry, In e' es -> eIndex e > eIndex e' /\ eTerm e >= eTerm e') /\ sorted es end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> Prop Arguments sorted {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
thing : forall (es l l' : list entry) (e e' : entry), sorted l -> sorted l' -> contiguous_range_exact_lo l' 0 -> entries_match l l' -> es <> [] -> Prefix es l' -> contiguous_range_exact_lo es (eIndex e) -> In e l -> In e' l' -> eIndex e = eIndex e' -> eTerm e = eTerm e' -> es ++ removeAfterIndex l (eIndex e) = l'
applied_entries_update : forall (sigma : name -> RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output), lastApplied st >= lastApplied (sigma h) -> applied_entries (update name_eq_dec sigma h st) = applied_entries sigma /\ (exists h' : name, argmax (fun h0 : name => lastApplied (sigma h0)) (all_fin N) = Some h' /\ lastApplied (sigma h') >= lastApplied st) \/ argmax (fun h' : name => lastApplied (update name_eq_dec sigma h st h')) (all_fin N) = Some h /\ applied_entries (update name_eq_dec sigma h st) = rev (removeAfterIndex (log st) (lastApplied st))
findAtIndex_elim : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex) (e : entry), findAtIndex l i = Some e -> i = eIndex e /\ In e l
incoming_entries_in_log : forall (es log : list entry) (x : entry) (i : logIndex), In x es -> uniqueIndices log -> exists y : entry, eIndex x = eIndex y /\ eTerm x = eTerm y /\ In y (es ++ removeAfterIndex log i)
cacheApplyEntry = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (e : entry) => match getLastId st (eClient e) with | Some (id, o) => if eId e <? id then ([], st) else if eId e =? id then ([o], st) else applyEntry st e | None => applyEntry st e end : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output -> entry -> list output * RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output Arguments cacheApplyEntry {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
handleRequestVote_cases : forall (h : name) (h' : fin N) (t lli llt : nat) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleRequestVote h st t h' lli llt = (st', m) -> st' = st \/ st' = advanceCurrentTerm st t \/ st' = {[advanceCurrentTerm st t with votedFor := Some h']} /\ (votedFor st = None /\ currentTerm st = t \/ currentTerm st < t)
commit_recorded = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) (h : Net.name) (e : entry) => In e (log (nwState net h)) /\ (eIndex e <= lastApplied (nwState net h) \/ eIndex e <= commitIndex (nwState net h)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Net.name -> entry -> Prop Arguments commit_recorded {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
terms_and_indices_from_one = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (l : list entry) => forall e : entry, In e l -> eTerm e >= 1 /\ eIndex e >= 1 : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> Prop Arguments terms_and_indices_from_one {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
maxIndex_gt_0_nonempty : forall es : list entry, 0 < maxIndex es -> es <> []
findAtIndex_intro' : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex) (e : entry), sorted l -> In e l -> eIndex e = i -> findAtIndex l i = Some e
output_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (out : output) (aes : list entry) => exists (xs : list entry) (e : entry) (ys : list entry) (tr' : list (input * output)) (st' : data), deduplicate_log aes = xs ++ e :: ys /\ eClient e = client /\ eId e = id /\ execute_log (xs ++ [e]) = (tr', st') /\ hd_error (rev tr') = Some (eInput e, out) : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, clientId -> nat -> output -> list entry -> Prop Arguments output_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope _ _%list_scope
findAtIndex_removeAfterIndex_agree : forall (xs : list entry) (i j : logIndex) (e e' : entry), NoDup (map eIndex xs) -> findAtIndex xs i = Some e -> findAtIndex (removeAfterIndex xs j) i = Some e' -> e = e'
applyEntries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix applyEntries (h : name) (st : raft_data) (entries : list entry) {struct entries} : list raft_output * raft_data := match entries with | [] => ([], st) | e :: es => let (out, st0) := cacheApplyEntry st e in let out0 := if name_eq_dec (eAt e) h then map (fun o : output => ClientResponse (eClient e) (eId e) o) out else [] in let (out', state) := applyEntries h st0 es in (out0 ++ out', state) end : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, name -> raft_data -> list entry -> list raft_output * raft_data Arguments applyEntries {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _ _ _%list_scope
handleAppendEntries_log_ind : handleAppendEntries ?h ?st ?t ?n ?pli ?plt ?es ?ci = (?st', ?ps) -> forall P : list entry -> Prop, P (log ?st) -> (?pli = 0 -> P ?es) -> (forall e : entry, ?pli <> 0 -> In e (log ?st) -> eIndex e = ?pli -> eTerm e = ?plt -> P (?es ++ removeAfterIndex (log ?st) ?pli)) -> P (log ?st') where ?h : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params |- name] ?st : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params |- raft_data] ?t : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params |- term] ?n...
applied_entries_safe_update : forall (sigma : name -> RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output), lastApplied st = lastApplied (sigma h) -> removeAfterIndex (log st) (lastApplied (sigma h)) = removeAfterIndex (log (sigma h)) (lastApplied (sigma h)) -> applied_entries (update name_eq_dec sigma h st) = applied_entries sigma
findAtIndex_intro : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex) (e : entry), sorted l -> In e l -> eIndex e = i -> uniqueIndices l -> findAtIndex l i = Some e
contiguous_range_exact_lo = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (xs : list entry) (lo : nat) => (forall i : nat, lo < i <= maxIndex xs -> exists e : entry, eIndex e = i /\ In e xs) /\ (forall e : entry, In e xs -> lo < eIndex e) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> nat -> Prop Arguments contiguous_range_exact_lo {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope _%nat_scope
replicaMessage = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (state : raft_data) (me host : name) => let prevIndex := Init.Nat.pred (getNextIndex state host) in let prevTerm := match findAtIndex (log state) prevIndex with | Some e => eTerm e | None => 0 end in let newEntries := findGtIndex (log state) prevIndex in (host, AppendEntries (currentTerm state) me prevIndex prevTerm newEntries (commitIndex state)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), raft_data -> name -> name -> name * msg Arguments replicaMessage {orig_base_params raft_params}
applied_entries_cases : forall sigma : name -> raft_data, applied_entries sigma = [] \/ (exists h : name, applied_entries sigma = rev (removeAfterIndex (log (sigma h)) (lastApplied (sigma h))))
handleRequestVoteReply_term_votedFor_cases : forall (me : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (src : name) (t : nat) (v : bool) (st' : raft_data), handleRequestVoteReply me st src t v = st' -> currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ votedFor st' = votedFor st \/ currentTerm st < currentTerm st' /\ votedFor st' = None
maxTerm_is_max : forall (l : list entry) (e : entry), sorted l -> In e l -> maxTerm l >= eTerm e
findAtIndex_not_in : forall (l : list entry) (e : entry), sorted l -> findAtIndex l (eIndex e) = None -> ~ In e l
handleAppendEntries_same_term_votedFor_preserved : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> currentTerm st' = currentTerm st -> votedFor st' = votedFor st
removeAfterIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix removeAfterIndex (entries : list entry) (i : logIndex) {struct entries} : list entry := match entries with | [] => [] | e :: es => if eIndex e <=? i then e :: es else removeAfterIndex es i end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex -> list entry Arguments removeAfterIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
prefix_within_term = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (l1 l2 : list entry) => forall e e' : entry, eTerm e = eTerm e' -> eIndex e <= eIndex e' -> In e l1 -> In e' l2 -> In e l2 : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> list entry -> Prop Arguments prefix_within_term {orig_base_params raft_params} (_ _)%list_scope
findGtIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix findGtIndex (entries : list entry) (i : logIndex) {struct entries} : list entry := match entries with | [] => [] | e :: es => if i <? eIndex e then e :: findGtIndex es i else [] end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex -> list entry Arguments findGtIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
contiguous_findAtIndex : forall (l : list entry) (s i : nat), sorted l -> contiguous_range_exact_lo l s -> s < i <= maxIndex l -> exists e : entry, findAtIndex l i = Some e
entries_match' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (entries entries' : list entry) => forall e e' e'' : entry, eIndex e = eIndex e' -> eTerm e = eTerm e' -> In e entries -> In e' entries' -> eIndex e'' <= eIndex e -> In e'' entries -> In e'' entries' : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> list entry -> Prop Arguments entries_match' {orig_base_params raft_params} (_ _)%list_scope
entries_match = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (entries entries' : list entry) => forall e e' e'' : entry, eIndex e = eIndex e' -> eTerm e = eTerm e' -> In e entries -> In e' entries' -> eIndex e'' <= eIndex e -> In e'' entries < -> In e'' entries' : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> list entry -> Prop Arguments entries_match {orig_base_params raft_params} (_ _)%list_scope

original: intros st es H. split. - apply haveNewEntries_not_empty in H. auto. - destruct (findAtIndex (log st) (maxIndex es)) eqn:H1. + left. split. * intro contra. discriminate. * reflexivity. + right. apply findAtIndex_elim in H1. destruct H1 as [e [H2 H3]]. exists e. split. * auto. * split. -- exists e. split; auto. -- reflexivity.
